definition: second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical significance of adenosine deaminase in chronic hepatitis B patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腺苷脫氨酶在慢性乙型肝炎中的應用價值。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the protect the protect rate of antibody after inoculability the second type hepatitis bacterin.
sentences.chinese: 目的初步評價乙型肝炎疫苗接種後抗體保護率。

sentences.english: Conclusions Hepatic microcirculatory disturbances exist in patients with hepatitis B .
sentences.chinese: 結論慢性乙型肝炎患者存在肝臟微循環障礙。

sentences.english: Most people in the region become infected with HBV during childhood.
sentences.chinese: 該地區大多數人在兒童時期即已感染乙型肝炎病毒。

sentences.english: It can be used to prevent and cure Hepatitis B and other immune diseases.
sentences.chinese: 因此，它是一種防治乙型肝炎及其他免疫病的藥物。

sentences.english: Hepatitis B is preventable with a safe and effective vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 乙型肝炎可通過接種安全有效的疫苗來加以預防。

sentences.english: An estimated 600 000 persons die each year due to the acute or chronic consequences of hepatitis B.
sentences.chinese: 估計每年有60萬人死於急性或慢性乙型肝炎。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the interruptive effect of blocking the paternal-fetal transmission of hepatitis B virus.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究預防免疫阻斷乙型肝炎病毒父嬰傳播的價值。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the curative effect on the treatment of chronic hepatitis B with Compound Rabdosia Ternifolia tablets.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察複方三葉香茶菜片對慢性乙型肝炎的療效。

sentences.english: The hepatitis B virus is 50 to 100 times more infectious than HIV.
sentences.chinese: 乙型肝炎病毒的傳染性比艾滋病毒強50至100倍。

sentences.english: Objective Observe the clinical curative effect of kurarinone and placenta peptide on chronic hepatitis II.
sentences.chinese: 觀察苦蔘素聯合胎盤肽治療慢性乙型肝炎的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic effects of acupoint electrotherapy in the treatment of chronic hepatitis B .
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察穴位電療法治療慢性乙型肝炎的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Fa. Te in the treatment of chronic hepatitis B (CHB).
sentences.chinese: 聯合安琺特治療慢性乙型肝炎肝纖維化的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Objective To study the possibility of HBV infection transmitted by infected spermatozoa .
sentences.chinese: 目的研究乙型肝炎病毒感染經精子傳播的可能性。

sentences.english: Where is hepatitis B most common?
sentences.chinese: 乙型肝炎在哪裏最常見？

sentences.english: Aim In order to study the significance of HGV infection in patients with chronic hepatitis B.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究慢性乙型肝炎患者庚型肝炎病毒感染的意義。

definition: human immune deficiency virus (HIV)/the AIDS virus
HIV/see also 愛滋病毒|爱滋病毒[ai4 zi1 bing4 du2]
